front_neck_width.gui_text: 1) Front Neck Width: Mark short line across top of clavicle bones, mark Clavicle Point. Use L square to draw level Clavicle Line from Clavicle Point beyond width of neck. Square-up inside corner of L-square at widest point where neck meets the shoulder, both levels true. Mark Neck Width Point at highest point at side of neck. Use L-square inside edge to draw vertical line from Neck Width Point to Clavicle Line, both levels true. Measure from this intersection to Clavicle Point.

front_neck_height.gui_text: 2) Front Neck Height: Measure from Neck Width Point down to Clavicle Line.

back_neck_width.gui_text: 3) Back Neck Width: Mark Nape Point. Use L-square to draw level Nape Line beyond width of neck. Square-up L-square at Neck Width Point, draw vertical line down to Nape Line. Measure from this intersection to Nape Point

back_neck_height.gui_text: 4) Back Neck Height: Measure from Neck Width Point down to Nape Line.

shoulder_seam.gui_text: 5) Shoulder Seam: Place 1st finger at end of  shoulder bone, then raise elbow. Mark Shoulder Point at fingernail. Put arm down. Use L-square to draw line from Neck Width Point to Shoulder Point. Mark Shoulder midpoint where slope of shoulder changes. Measure from Neck Width Point to Shoulder Point.

shoulder_midpoint.gui_text: 6) Shoulder Midpoint: Measure from Neck Width Point to Shoulder Midpoint.

neck_circumference.gui_text: 2) - Neck Circumference: Mark point at middle of Nape. Use L square to draw horizontal line beyond width of Neck. Square-up Lsquare along line with Neck Width Point. Draw vertical line from Neck Width Point to Nape line, keeping both levels true. Measure around through Neck Width Point to Clavicle Point.

front_neck_circumference.gui_text: 3) Front Neck Circumference: Measure from Neck Width Point around to Clavicle Point.

bust_circumference.gui_text: Bust Circumference: Use Duct tape between breasts and between shoulder blades

front_waist_circumference.gui_text: Front Width at Waist from Sideseam to Sideseam

back_waist_circumference.gui_text: Back Width at Waist from Sideseam to Sideseam

front_hip_circumference.gui_text: Front Width at Hip from Sideseam to Sideseam

back_hip_circumference.gui_text: Back Width at Hip from Sideseam to Sideseam

back_shoulder_height.gui_text: Back Shoulder Height - from line drawn across Nape straight up to widest point of neck.

center_back_length.gui_text: Center Back Length - from Nape to Waist, with Duct Tape between shoulder blades

across_back.gui_text: Across Back at Top of Shoulder Seam

mid_back.gui_text: Across Back at Narrowest width between Arms

full_back_width.gui_text: Across Back at Armpit from Sideseam to Sideseam
